location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: File 451/1913 Pt 1 'Oil: Deposits in Koweit, Bahrein, Farsan Isles, Syria'

mods.abstract: Correspondence between British officials concerning the possibility of discovering oil deposits in Koweit [Kuwait] and Bahrein [Bahrain], with some reference also made to the potential for deposits to be found in Syria and the Farsan Isles [Farasan Islands].The principal correspondents are officials at the India Office, the Foreign Office and the Government of India.The file also contains translated copies of correspondence between the ruler of Bahrain, Shaikh ‘Īsá bin ‘Alī Āl Khalīfah, and Major Arthur Prescott Trevor, Political Agent in Bahrain regarding his acquiescence in the granting of concessions for oil exploration.
